frameset.note: Frames file for 'report' based on first handful of sentences from large corpus, plus reference to 'expect' and 'say'

roleset.name: report, tell

example.name: just the news
example.text: Commonwealth Edison reported earnings of $737 million.

example.name: just hearer
example.text: He will report to Donald Pardus.

example.name: passivized
example.text: Preliminary findings were reported more than a year ago by the AMA

example.name: passive extraction
example.text: Retail sales were reported *trace* slow in most districts.

example.name: another passive extraction
example.text: Hammersmith is reported *trace* to have been sold.

example.name: untargeted passive
example.text: This goes past what had been reported *trace=what* before.

example.name: fronted
example.text: The FBI found evidence for an alien invasion, Agt Mulder reported *trace*
example.arg: *trace* -> The FBI found evidence for an alien invasion

example.name: inverted
example.text: Japanese corporations bought South Dakota, reported *trace* Newsweek.

example.name: discourse-connective
example.text: As *trace-1* reported *trace-2*, John said something stupid again.

roleset.note: Note: as with "say", the automatic tagger chooses an embedded S as the argument of "report" rather than the S-BAR, even in cases with a complementizer ("reported that blah"). To avoid having to change too many sentences, we should follow this pattern.
